verses.roman:
siṁha-dvāra ḍāhine chāḍi' saba vaiṣṇava-gaṇa
kāśī-miśra-gṛha-pathe karilā gamana

synonyms: siṁha-dvāra ḍāhine—on the right side of the lion gate; chāḍi'—leaving aside; saba—all; vaiṣṇava-gaṇa—devotees of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kāśī-miśra-gṛha—to the house of Kāśī Miśra; pathe—on the way; karilā gamana—began to proceed.
translation: Beginning from the right side of the lion gate, or the main gate of the temple, all the Vaiṣṇavas began to proceed toward the house of Kāśī Miśra.
